nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang bsnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das pa na bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi
khams na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba da lta bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
khams de na byang chub kyi sems rin po che las rin po che gzhan mi 'byung ngo / /de bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa de'ang nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos 'chad pa de na seng+ge'i khri dang bcas te ta la bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon
par 'phags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po der nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos nyan
te de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /shA ri'i bu/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
de na gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtsegs pa'i yongs su longs spyod pa de ni/ bskal par yang brjod mi nus so/ /shA ri'i bu/ khyod kyis nga'i seng+ge'i khri 'di mthong
ngam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mthong ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de'i
seng+ge'i khri'ang 'di 'dra ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag
pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
dngos po med pas chos thams cad yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / snang bar gyur pa med
pas chos thams cad rnam par rig pa med pa dang / rgyu dang dmigs pa med bas chos thams cad snang bar gyur ba med pa dang / nye bar zhi bar mtshan nyid pas chos thams
cad dmigs pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / so so tha dad pa med pas chos thams cad gnyis su med pa dang / tshul gcig la zhugs
pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang bral bas chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang / dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas chos
thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / thams cad la mi gnas pas chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil dang / thams cad du mi snang bas chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i
sgo dang / yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa dang / nang dang phyi'i rnam par dag pas chos thams cad yul med pa dang / rang bzhin
gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis nye bar zhi bas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang /
sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa med pas chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / gzod ma nas ma byung bas chos thams cad mchan nyid med pa
dang / nga yi ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ba dang / bdag po med pas chos thams cad nga yi ba med cing yongs su
'dzin pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag po med pa dang / gzod ma nas rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
bdag med pa dang / ldog pa med pas chos thams cad gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa dang / sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin pas chos thams cad ldog pa med pa dang
dngos po med pas chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / sems dang lus dben pas
chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid med bas chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
rang gi mtshan nyid las ma g.yos pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / gnas dmigs su med pas chos thams cad ma g.yos pa dang / dmigs
pa med pa'i mtha' la rab tu gnas pas chos thams cad gnas med pa dang / kun gzhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang / kun gzhi dang bral bas chos
thams cad kun gzhi med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug
pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de thos pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam
par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzod pa chos thams cad la dbang byed pa rjes su thob bo/ /yang shA ri'i bu/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams de'i byang chub
sems dpa' rnams ni/ sbyin pas brgyan cing / bskal pa grangs med par gtong ba'i rjes su song ba/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan cing blo shin tu byang ba/ bzod pas
brgyan cing sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshogs bsags
pa| bsam gtan gyis brgyan cing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam
par rtsen pa/ shes rab kyis brgyan cing bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba/ byams pa chen pos brgyan
cing sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa/ snying rje chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa/ dga' ba chen
pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / bde ba rab tu dga' ba la so sor 'god pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing sems can
thams cad mi mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go /yang shA ri'i bu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig
pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod ces bya ba 'dug ste/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis shin tu brjid pa/ ye
shes mthong ba thogs pa med pa/ mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis byams pa brgyan pa/ spobs pas ngag brgyan pa/ gzungs kyis
sems brgyan pa/ thos pas dran pa brgyan pa/ nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa/ rtog pas don rtogs pa brgyan pa/ bsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/
khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa brgyan pa/ sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tshom med par gyur pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing mtho dman med pa/ mngon
par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/ bsod nams kyis brgyan cing lag na rin po che gtong bas mngon par grub
pa| ye shes kyis brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/ blos brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rtogs par byed pa/ mig
gis brgyan cing mig lnga'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa/ rna bas brgyan cing sgra dang don thams cad rtogs pa'i snying po dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas
brgyan cing don dang chos dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad par ston pa/ stobs kyis brgyan cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rjes su
thob pa| mi 'jigs pas brgyan cing phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa thob pa/ chos
kyis brgyan cing spu'i bu ga thams cad nas chos sgrog pa/ so sor rig pa'i rjes su song ba/ snang bas brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad lag mthil du thob pa/ 'od
kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar byed pa/ kun nas ston pas brgyan cing phyad par lung ston pa/ gdams pa dang rjes su bstan
pas brgyan cing de byed pa'i chos tshar phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnam par grol pa thams cad ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis mngon par bstod pas brgyan cing gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ tshogs thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi chos 'dul ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu/ gang bkod pa 'di lta bu kun tu snang ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs so/ /shA
kyi'i bu| byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de nga la blta ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang /
bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di'ang rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i gan du 'ong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de la
gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu mngon du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed pa sangs rgyas
kyi rnam par rol pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig byung ba tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de yang snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs
dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dang ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa/ 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nyi
ma rab tu 'bar ba dang / me shel dang / mdog mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / mdog mdzes par 'dug pa dang / s+tha la dang / s+tha la chen po dang / s+tha la rab
mdzes dang / dri ma med pa dang / kun tu dri ma med pa dang / rnam dag 'od dang / gser du snang dang / nam mkha' snang ba dang / reg gyur dang / dri chen dkar dang / 'dab
brgya pa dang / ze ba stong ldan dang / mya ngan sel ba dang / dga' byed dang / lha'i stong dang / klu'i me tog dang / dga' ba bde ba kun skyed pa dang /
bsam gtan yan lag dang / dris dga' ba dang / lus sems tshim byed dang / stong gsum dri dang / nad kun zhi byed dang / nad kun sel dang / bdag gi gzi brjid kyis
brgyan cing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpas rig pa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
'di kun tu khebs par byas pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/ /de nas thams cad dang
ldan pa'i 'khor des sngon ma thos ma mthong ba'i me tog de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta bu'i me tog blta na sdug
pa 'di dag ga la mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bkod pa chen
po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'ongs te de nam mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'di dag dang lhan cig tu nam mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
mgo bos phyag btsal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa
gcig pa de bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar reg pa la gnas sam ces snyun gsol zhing / byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i tshos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal
ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing / chos chen po dang ldan pas slar ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi bka' mchid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis mgu bar mdzod
cig /ces de skad kyang gsung ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng+ge'i khri steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong phrag bcu tsam gyi rin
po che'i gdugs byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod/ chos dang don dang yon
tan ye shes 'phags pas na/ /yongs dag rnam dag snga nas dag cing dri ma med/ /gnas med nam mkha' 'dra bar mi g.yo rab tu brnyes/ /rab zab kun
nas spyod yul min la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni rab phye sku mnyam yang / /gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad/ /sems can rnams
la phan pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas/ /bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston/ /khyod ni mi gsung rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med/ /tshig gi rang bzhin
brag ca'i mtshan nyid gzung du med/ /sgra med rtags med yi ge med pa mkhyen nas kyang / /byams pa khyod ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i tshig kyang gsung / /sems can kun
gyi sems dang sems byung rjes su rig /khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen/ /sems kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ji 'dra rab mkhyen kyang / /sems dang
yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas/ /'gro ba rnams la khyed kyis spyod pa kun bstan te/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni 'gyur ba yong ma mchis/ /gang gi gzugs
dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar/ /mtshan dang spyod lam dag kyang de yi tshul du ston/ /bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa med/ /khyod ni chos la gnas pa
med cing 'dzin pa med/ /sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyis 'dul mkhyen nas/ /khyod ni bla na med pa'i chos rnams rtag tu ston/ /rgyal ba'i sku la 'khor 'di kun gyis bltas pa
na| |gzugs dang mtshan ma tha dad skal pa mi mnyam nas/ /khyod kyi sku ni mi 'gyur rtog med mtshan med de/ /'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin tshim par mdzad//
chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste/ /byed med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog las skyes/ /bde gshegs de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su/ /byang chub mi
'gyur zhi ba bla na med pa brnyes/ /mtha' dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog pa med/ /stong zhing gsog la rang bzhin gso ba ste ya ma brla/ /khyod kyis de 'dra'i
chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen nas su/ /'gro ba rnams la rgyu dang las dang byed pa ston/ /chos 'di sems can med cing srog dang gang zag med/ /nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas na
ming yang rnam par dag /sems can gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag med pa/ /mi 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sad mdzad/ /brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs kyis
byang chub 'di tshol phyir/ /khyod kyis bskal pa bsam yas bye ba phrag brgyar spyad/ /sgrub pa med pa'i nan tan mtshan nyid byang chub ste/ /gang phyir spyod pa'i don de rjes su thob
par 'gyur/ /chos rnams mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam par bzhag mkhyen pas/ /rab dang 'bring dang tha ma dag kyang mnyam par mkhyen/ /mnyam pa nyid
la mnyam nyid rtag bzhugs rnam mi rtog /de phyir rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing mi 'gyur ba/ /phung po khams dang dbang po ji ltar sgyu ma bzhin/ /'jig rten gsum po chu zla
'dra ste 'pho ba med/ /sems can rnams ni rmi lam lta bur dngos med de/ /mkhyen pas rmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas chos 'di gsung / /byang chub mchog rab brda yi rang
bzhin khyod kyis brnyes/ /de ni thob dang ma thob pa zhes brjod du med/ /ji ltar byang chub khyod kyis de bzhin 'khor lo yang / /tshul dang tshul min 'jug pa'i mtshan bral rab
tu bskor/ /rgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas rab sgrol ba/ /grol nas bcings pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu grol/ /theg chen bla med 'di la 'gro ba dbugs
'byin cing / /nges 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la 'god/ /gang na sems can nam yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis/ /sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems
can nyid mi sgrub/ /sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas/ /'di yi mtha' rnams sems can mang po rtogs par mdzad/ /nam mkha' la ni gzugs
rnams nam yang mi snang bzhin/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs ni gzugs nyid mtshungs/ /chos de gzugs dang gzugs med gzugs min mtshan nyid de/ /gang gis de ltar
don rnams yang dag dben rtogs pa/ /ci tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa dag gis dper bgyis pa/ /de dag thams cad bsngags pa 'di la mthong chags te/ /rang gi yon
tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags nam mkha' 'dra/ /gnyis med bsngags brjod de ni rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'o/ /sangs rgyas 'gro ba sad par mdzad cing dmigs med pa/ /
sems med sems nyid brnyes pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyi mi yi seng+ge bsngags/ /de ltar de bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags/ /sems
can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam/ /thams cad rtogs nas chos dbyings rjes su rig par bgyi/ /chos kun 'dod chags bral ba mtshan gyi tshul
shes pa| |des ni mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras
ma thag tu nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis kun tu brjod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ rmi lam na'ang
mngon par zhen pas dmigs par lta ba mi 'byung ngo / /gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang / gang yang thos nas sgrub pa de dag ni/
ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod da ltar seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du/ /de dag kyang seng+ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro/ /zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung ngo / /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang 'dus pa chen
po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang /
chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la'ang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang cung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ da skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis chos kyi
rnam grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tshom du gyur pa de nges par bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo
la rab tu gnas pas de dag gi the tshom thams cad kyang rab tu bsal cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar bgyis pa de legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gal te de bzhin
gshegs pas bdag la skabs phye na/ chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka' mchid cung zad cig bdag zhu'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mi chags pa'i ye
shes can te/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma lags pa mkhyen pa/ ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ snang ba brnyes pa ste/ mun pa thams cad
dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ don mkhyen pa ste/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ dus mkhyen pa ste/ tshod las mi 'da' zhing
phyad par lung ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ chod mkhyen pa ste/ sems can thams cad la so so rigs par chos ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ rnam par rol pa ste/ mngon
par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ shin tu rnam par gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa ste/ sems can thams
cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun tu ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mngon par 'phags pa ste/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba/
bcom ldan 'das ni/ zil gyis ma non pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dpa' bo gcig po/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ rang byung ba ste/ slob dpon med
par chos thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa med pa dang / lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag
pa'i lam ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ thog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu bsgribs pa dang / shin tu
bsgribs pa dang / kun nas sdang bas bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa rnams nad ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan
'das ni/ stobs dang / drag shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas shing gsum rig pa'i rig pa brnyes pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ mi
'jigs pa chen po brnyes pa ste/ zag pa zad cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba mkhyen pa
la mkhas pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyu mchog seng+ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la thogs
pa med pa'i ye shes can/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khrul ba dang ca co mi mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / rnam
par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhe 'gras pa med pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems
snyoms pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ thugs rje chen po la gnas pa ste/ legs par byas pa dang /
nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas mi skyod pa/ sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ sangs rgyas thams
cad dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ bye brag med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing sems
can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni/ 'dod pa med pa ste/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa/ rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang
bral ba| bcom ldan 'das ni/ thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa spyan lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ni/ de ltar
de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang / chos dang / ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang / ldan par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te
gus pa dang bcas shing chos la gces sbras su bgye ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
kyis mngon par sgrub pas chos 'tshal ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ ji ltar gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa rigs kyi bu/ khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid du
lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der
'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
zhu bar 'dod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigs
su bcad pa slar smras pa/ gang rnams sems dang sems la sems yid mtshungs/ /shin tu bsam sems ye shes mnyam la gnas/ /sems la sems med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul//
de dag don du rgyal la bdag zhu'o/ /snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma med/ /yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo gcod pa/ /nges byas rnam par thar pa la gzhag pa/ /de dag ched du bde
bar gshegs la zhu/ /bdag la bdag med shin tu rnam dag yid/ /sems can don zhugs sems can med la dga'/ /sems can bdag med gnyis las thar byed pa/ /rnam
par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'di'o/ /cho ga spyod yul brtul zhugs yongs su dag /bsam pa dag cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra/ /lhun po lta bar brtan cing mi g.yo ba/ /de
dag ched du don yod mdzad la zhu/ /mi ldog brtan pa brtson 'grus kun nas bzang / /dpa' bo bdud kyi dgra yi nga rgyal bcom/ /nyon mongs rab tu nyon mongs dri sbyong ba/
mthong dga' de dag don du 'di zhu'o/ /thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga'/ /bsam gtan rnam thar shes rab mchog tu gyur/ /mngon
shes bsam gtan rnam par grol ba'i 'od/ /rab dag dri med don du bdag zhu'o/ /stong pa mtshan ma med cing mi smon gnas/ /bsam bzhin shi 'pho dang ni skye ba ston/ /skyes
pa med cing mi gnas 'chi 'pho med/ /de dag don du mi yi spyod pa zhu/ /nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis/ /rtogs par dka' zhing zab mo mthong dka' ba/ /skye
bo kun gyi yid rnams kun skul ba'i/ /chos kyi gtam ni bde bar gshegs la zhu/ /legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'/ /chos la chos med 'dzin pa gnyis las
grol| |rtag tu mnyam bzhag mchog gi chos la dga'/ /sems kyang nam mkha' mtshungs ba'i don du zhu/ /gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dga'/ /rtag tu sangs
rgyas bstod pa kun med blo/ /grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos/ /yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
pa rnams lags/ tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsam gtan nam
mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams
lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes
su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob cing byang
chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod de sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon
mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad
yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang
dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du tshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags/ mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang
bgyid pa rnams lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/ rten cing 'brel
par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin
nyid dbyer med pa shes pa mkhas pa rnams lags/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol pa rnams lags/
bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag
pa rnams lags/ gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjod par spyod pa rnams lags/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa rgyun mi chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin
gyis brlabs pa rnams lags/ skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing
bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa rnams lags/ bsod nams kyis tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams lags/
sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa rnams lags/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad
kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa rnams lags/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / nam mkha' la rlung dmar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa rnams
lags| cho ga dang spyod pa'i tshul shes pa dang / mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa rnams lags/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang byung gi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa
rnams lags/ myur du theg pa chen po las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la
don 'di 'dri bar sems pa legs so/ /'di lta ste/ khyod ni/ sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob
pa| byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ rtag tu chos las mi dom
pa| ye shes kyi mtshon cha can/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las
yang dag par 'das pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha'
rtogs par sla ba ma yin no/ /de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyis yon tan 'di rnams dang / gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das/ legs so/ /zhes gsol nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin
pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sems can rnam par
dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / bsngo ba rnam par dag pas byang chub rnam par dag pa
la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas sbyin
pa de byin te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/
lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin
pa de byin/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de byin te/ de rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de byin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtha'
med pa de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing sgrib pa med pa de bzhin du byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam
mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhin du gzugs thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral
bar sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi mdud pa med par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam
mkha' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad med par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa mi
gnas par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar
nam mkha' mi zad pa de bzhin du dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi zad par bsngo zhing sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med pa de bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams
cad kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de byin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha'
sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la nga yi ba med pa de bzhin du sems
can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de byin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa de byin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub ste/
sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub
sems dpas sbyin pa de byin te/ rigs kyi bu/ gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad
yongs su 'dor zhing thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni/ sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de lta bur mi gtong ba'i sems ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha'
dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag gi rnam pa med pa ste/ rnam par dag pa/ sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi rnam pa ste/ chos
rnam par dag pa/ ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ ye shes rnam par dag pa/ shes rab kyi rnam pa ste/ shes rab rnam par dag pa/ sems kyi rnam pa ste/ sems rnam par dag pa/
'jig rten gyi rnam pa ste/ 'jig rten rnam par dag pa/ gzugs med pa ste/ gzugs su ston pa dang / mi ston pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mun pa
med cing mun pa rab tu snang bar byed pa/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gshig pas mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa/ mthar phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa/ mi zad pa'i
bzod pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi mkhyen pa'i lung bstan pa thob pa/ mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa' nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/
phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing dbang bskur ba thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs shing mnyam pa nyid kyi mnyam par spyod pa/ legs par
spyod pa la spyad pa/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi spyod yul te/ skyes bu dam pa de
dang / de dag ni/ de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par byed do/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa skyes so/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa byin/ /byang chub phyir te rnam smin yong mi 'dod/ /dga'
zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med de/ /rab tu grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa byin/ /mkhas pas chos rnams sgyu 'drar shes nas su/ /lus dang srog la'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing / /
de dag la ni nam yang 'dzin pa med/ /de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges/ /thams cad gtang yang mi dgar mi 'gyur zhing / /de la zhum pa med de gong ba med/ /de yis nam
mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms/ /de bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa med/ /bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam par dag /byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa
byin/ /de ni sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par/ /spros pa med par sbyin pa rab tu byin/ /sems mnyam yid kyang mnyam pas sbyin pa gtong / /rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med
par sbyin/ /bsam pa yengs dag dri ma med pa yis/ /thams cad gtong yang rnam par smin mi 'dod/ /lus dang tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra/ /longs spyod rmi lam glog bzhin
snying po med/ /'jig rten kun la snying rje brtse bskyed nas/ /'jig rten chos kyis mgos sbyin pa byin/ /nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong / /rgyal ba'i tshig gi
gnas su 'gyur snyam ste/ /bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags mi rnyed/ /de ltar brtags nas thams cad gtong ba yin/ /stobs bcus byin pa rtsa ba yin zhes
gsungs/ /de la rab tu gnas na tshul khrims ldan/ /tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam gtan rnyed/ /bsam gtan ma chags shes rab
rdzogs par byed/ /sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems rab tshim/ /nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir mi skye/ /sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan la phan par gsungs/ /phan dang bde ba
'dus byas sbyin pas mgu/ /sbyin gtong nyon mongs spang zhing dge ba'i phyir/ /des na 'dzin pa la ni chags mi 'gyur/ /pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni mi gtong ste/ /bdag blo rnam
dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo / /ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong / /de ltar des ni byang chub yon tan mthong / /ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong / /de lta de ltar
sems can brgya tshim byed/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi
dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i lus mnyam
pa nyid dang / brag ca lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de
dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu| brgyad po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims
yongs su dag pa ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang / tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyan
thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pa dang / dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir bslab pa thams cad mi 'dor ba dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad
du mi 'jug pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa dang / /mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / nyon mongs pa
yongs su dag pa'i phyir kun nas gdung ba med pa dang / byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems
dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o/ /gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni/ nam mkha' dag pa ste/ tshul khrims de yang dag pa'o/ /nam mkha' dri
ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang dri ma med pa'o/ /nam mkha' zhi ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zhi ba'o/ /nam mkha' mi mtho ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi mtho ba'o/ /nam
mkha' mi dma' ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi dma' ba'o/ /nam mkha' gzung du med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gzung du med pa'o/ /nam mkha'
gnas med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gnas med pa'o/ /nam mkha' med pa ma yin te/ tshul khrims de'ang med pa ma yin pa'o/ /nam mkha' rtag pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang
rtag pa'o/ /nam mkha' mi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi zad pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshan ma med pa'o/ /nam mkha' rgyu ba med
pa ste| tshul khrims de'ang rgyu ba med pa'o/ /nam mkha' spros pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang spros pa med pa'o/ /nam mkha' zag pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zag pa med
pa'o| |nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi 'gyur ba'o/ /nam mkha' rnam par mi rtog
pa ste| tshul khrims de'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang thams cad du song ba'o/ /nam mkha' mi chod mi phyed pa ste/ tshul
khrims de'ang mi chod mi phyed pa'o/ /nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o/ /nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs
bcan ma yin pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ tshul khrims nam
mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /sems kyi tshul khrims dri med srung zhing gdung ba med/ /lus dang sems
kyang rnam dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams/ /mkhas pa rtag tu nad zhi tshul khrims dregs mi stems/ /blo 'chang sems la mi gnas byang chub sems la rton/ /las gang ma byas ma
bsam de bzhin ma brtags te/ /de ni dmar sngo ser min kha dog gzugs mi gnas/ /gzugs med mi bden mi g.yo dben pa nam mkha' bzhin/ /tshul khrims lta ba'i gnas
med mkhas pa kun gyis bsngags/ /tshul khrims de ni rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs zhi/ /zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mthar ston pa/ /gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul
khrims brten/ /de bas tshul khrims thar byed byang chub rtsa ba'i gzhi/ /gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa/ /yo byad bsnyungs shing bsam gtan dben tshogs
sems sbyangs pa/ /tshul khrims de yi gnas des sems rkang thar pa'i rten/ /de phyir tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thar gnas pa/ /g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i
nyon mongs gcod/ /nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin spyod/ /byang chub phyir nges mi gtong byang chub kun mi rtog /gang
mkhas chos shes de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyin/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba/ bam po gnyis pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub
sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang
zhe na| 'di lta ste/ tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe ba dang / lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdegs kyang slar mi rdeg pa dang / sems
nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spyos kyang slar mi spyod ba dang / bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
na| byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa
'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam
mkha' la rjes su chags pa med de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rjes su chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni /mnyam par sbyor ba ste/ sems can thams
cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ ma smad ma nyams ba ste/ lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam
mkha' ni/ bag la nyal thams cad spangs pa ste/ bag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa ste/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i
bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ ma skyes ma byung ba ste/ ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa thams cad
la khyab pa ste/ byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
pa'o| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa dang / 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid la bzod kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin
pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang / smon pa med pa la bzod kyang byang chub tu smon pa med pa ma yin pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa la bzod
kyang 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba med pa la bzod kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba med pa la
bzod kyang skye ba dang gnas pas ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa la bzod kyang dngos po rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam
par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o/ /bzod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'di dag
bdag la gshe'ang bzod do/ /snyam pa de ni/ nga yir 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di dag gshe ba bdag gis bzod par bya'o//
snyam pa de ni/ ngar 'dzin pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di dag ni/ yi ge bsnor ba'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ sgra dang / skad kyi bzod pa ste/ de ni/
nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di'ang stong pa/ bdag kyang stong pa'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/ de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
bzod pa ma yin no/ /bdag gis bzod pa bya'o/ /snyam pa de ni/ rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/ de ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/
shing sA la chen po'i tshal yod par la la zhig 'ongs te shing sA la bcad na/ de la shing sA la bcad pa'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni/ bcad do/ /bdag ni/ ma bcad do/ /
snyam du mi sems te/ de dag la rjes su chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med de/ mi rtog /rnam par mi rtog/ yongs su mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ gang bzod pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i
bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /zad pa shes pa bzod pa mi zad
gtsang / /yid ni yul la ma chags shin tu bsgoms/ /phyi nang shin tu rnam dag mi gnas pa/ /nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam sems mchog bzod pa'o/ /lus 'di gzugs brnyan rtsi
shing rtsig pa 'dra/ /sems kyang gzugs med mi snang sgyu ma 'dra/ /chos 'di lta ba'i gnas med nam mkha' bzhin/ /lus kyang mi 'gyur yid la khro ba med/ /bkur sti byed la dga' dang
zhe sdang med/ /mtho dang dma' bar rnam par rtog pa med/ /theg pa gang 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de/ /sems can dag par bstan 'dir bzod smra yin/ /srog med gang zag bdag med
sems can med/ /chos 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing / /rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'gal mi byed/ /de ni bstan 'dir bzod mchog yang dag nyid/ /kha ngan zer ba'i tshig
thos mi gshe zhing / /byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin/ /bdag rnam bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong de/ /bstan 'dir sems can gtsang ma
bzod smra yin/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom pa yang chos thams cad yongs su
ma grub par rab tu shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang dag par rjes
su mthong ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang sems can rnam par dag pas sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin
kyang 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ brtson 'grus gang
gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan lta bur rig pas mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma brlar rnam par brtags te mi
dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sems ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems de sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang
gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu sdud par byed kyang de gcig nas gcig tu sems zad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang
gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid rnam par brtags te yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang
gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad
'dzin par byed pa de'ang sgra brag ca dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa de'ang chos kyi
dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su
dag pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di gnyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so/ /de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o/ /yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ len pa
med pa| 'dor ba med pa/ gnas med pa ste/ nam byang chub sems dpa' lus dang / ngag dang / sems sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi gnas par shin tu brtags nas mi dmigs
shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pas rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin
no| |ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang chos thams cad la mi gnas shing
sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams
kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o/ /ji ltar nam mkha' las rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog skye'ang
rtsa ba med cing gnas med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyes kyang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do/ /ji
ltar nam mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus de'ang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song yang 'pho ba'i
mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor zhing gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad
la chos thams cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna tshogs kun tu ston to/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas yang dag par rjes su
mi mthong zhing / gang la rtsom pa de'ang rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /de nas bcom
ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /brtson 'grus dag gi stobs kyis mthu bskyed nas/ /lus dang srog la'ang phangs par mi byed cing / /bdag nyid chen
po byang chub spyad pa spyod/ /sems can phan pa'i don byed phan sems pa/ /sngon gyi srid par 'dus byas ci srid pa/ /byang chub yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor/ /de dag skyo bar
'gyur ba'ang yong med de/ /phyi phyir brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed/ /sems can bsam mi khyab pa dgrol bar brtson/ /sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa
mchod par brtson/ /zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab lta bar brtson/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bdud rnams gdul bar brtson/ /sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong bar brtson/ /tshul
khrims bsam gyis mi khyab srung bar brtson/ /bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ /brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab dge bar brtson/ /bsam gtan bsam gyis mi
khyab sems par brtson/ /shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ /byams pa bsam gyis mi khyab sgom par brtson/ /don dang yon tan sgrub pa rab tu brtson/ /srog dang
lus kyang mi phangs brtson par byed/ /nyon mongs 'thab pa kun las rnam par grol/ /stong pa rnam thar bdag med mngon par brtson/ /bdag la bdag med che ba'i bdag nyid
brtson| |lta las rnam grol byang chub phyir yang brtson/ /sgyu ma smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du brtson/ /sems med sems kyang sems ma yin pa thob/ /g.yo ba med pa'i chos rnams ston
par brtson/ /'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol/ /bshad cing klog pa la ni rtag tu brtson/ /chos dang chos min gnyis las shin tu 'das/ /sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la
brtson| |'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams smra/ /sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med/ /sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang mtha' med de/ /mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus
sbyor| |sems can spyod mtha' med la rab tu 'jug /chos 'di rnams ni skye med 'gag med de/ /mkhas pa de dag sems kyang mi zhum zhing / /phyi phyir brtson 'grus rlabs chen rab bskyed
de| |'di 'dra'i chos la sems can sgom du btsud/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos
bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nang du yang dag 'jog la nang du sems gnas par
yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / sems phyi rol nas kyang zlog la phyi rol tu sems rgyu ba'ang mi dmigs pa dang / bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis sems can thams
cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid de'ang sems kyi sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos
bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs
su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang
khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la
gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas
te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams la gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams la
gnas te bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o/ /gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i
sems ni/ bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtog pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la mi mtho mi dma' ba/ mi bstod mi smod pa/ 'gyur
ba med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ gsog pa med pa/ 'bri ba med pa/ 'dzin pa med pa/ gtong ba med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rtog pa med pa/ rnam par
rtog pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis ma yin pa'ang ma yin pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/
spros pa med pa/ gsog pa med pa/ bri ba med pa/ sgom pa med pa/ 'jigs pa med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad la mi gnas pa/ gang sems mi gnas pa
de ni| sems nges par rtog pa'o/ /sems nges par rtog pa ni/ gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/ mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam
par dag par bsam gtan byed do/ /sems nges par rtog pa ni/ sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par
bsam gtan byed do/ /sems nges par rtog pa ni/ dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/ sna dang / dri dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed
do| |sems nges par rtog pa ni/ ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa reg cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/ /sems
nges par rtog pa ni/ reg pa rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lus dang / reg pa dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/ /sems nges
par rtog pa ni/ chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ yid dang / chos dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do//
rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bskal pas sreg pa na nam mkha' mi 'tshig cing / chus 'jigs pa na nam mkha' gsher bar mi 'gyur pa de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa'i bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'tshig cing bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms
par 'jug pa thams cad la'ang ma tshogs pa yin no/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'ang yin la sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do/ /mnyam
par bzhag kyang dga' ba med la langs nas kyang khong khro ba med pa yin no/ /'phags pa'i skye bo rnams la zhi ba nye bar ston kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams yongs
su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rab tu 'bar bar yang byed do/ /mnyam par bzhag cing mnyam pa'ang yin la mi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston
pa'ang rab tu ston to/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa'ang mi mthong ngo / /mi mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do/ /de ni/ mi 'gal zhing 'gal ba
med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/ /shes rab che ba'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes
bya'o| |gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /bsam gtan rnams kyis dbang po yongs su dag /dran pa rtse gcig yid ni mnyam par bzhag /gnas rnams thams
cad la yang mi gnas shing / /'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag/ nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi/ /phung po skye mched khams la mi gnas shing / /nye bar zhi ba dben
pa spyod yul te/ /mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag /mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa/ /chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yid/ /shin tu dben
pa'i sems kyang ston byed cing / /mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mi chags so/ /'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /'chi'i pho skye ba 'chi ba nyer ston kyang / /ting nge
'dzin las de dag mi nyams te/ /de ni sems rtogs dbang gis de 'dra'o/ /gzugs med ting nge 'dzin kyang spyod yul la/ /sems can rnams ni yongs su smin bya'i phyir/ /
'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed de/ /de dag bdag dang sems can mi gnas so/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te/ /sgyu ma dang /
yang mtshungs shing smig rgyu 'dra/ /rmi lam mchu zla sprin gyi mtshan nyid du/ /chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag /'gro ba kun gyi sems kyi spyod yul dang / /'gro ba
rnams la sems dang blo 'jug cing / /sems rgyud la ni sgrib pa med pa ste/ /rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes/ /bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa yis//
zhing rnams mang po bye bar der 'gro zhing / /mi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa'i yid/ /rgyal ba bsam mi khyab la mchod par byed/ /dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i
yid| |zhi gnas pha rol phyin cing mi rtog pa/ /de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid/ /rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag /mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yod med la//
mnyam pa nyid ces bya bar mtshan med de/ /mnyam nyid de la gang dag rab gnas pa/ /de dag rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems
dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs
pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa
thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas bdag dang sems can dang srog dang gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / /don rnam par
dag pas yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
yin no| |rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni/ 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub
kyang rtag par lta bar mi sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar mi lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug kyang
mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par snang yang nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la mi chags pa dang / chos kyi sdom bzhi'ang
ston la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang
las byed cing rnam par smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / spros pa med pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin yang chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu
dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang / chos thams cad kyi snang ba la rab tu rnyed pa yin gyi/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'ang sems can rnams la rab
tu ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa'o/ /yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni/ rnam par rtog pa kun nas
'bar ba med pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go /rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go /gnas med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ rnam par mi rtog
pa'i tshig go /yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni/ ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go /'gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di ni/ bden pa'i tshig go /ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir
'di ni| yang dag pa'i tshig go /bcings pa yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni/ yid rno ba'i tshig go /'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni/ ngoms pa'i tshig go /shin
tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni/ nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go /brjod du med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ don gyi tshig go /khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mtshungs pa'i tshig go /
mi shigs pa'i phyir 'di ni/ snying po'i tshig go /mi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni/ ma g.yos pa'i tshig go /rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di ni/ rdo rje'i tshig go /byed pa byas pa'i phyir
'di ni| sgrol ba'i tshig go /rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ rnam par dag pa'i tshig go /snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mun pa med pa'i
tshig go /sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ gnyis su med pa'i tshig go /shin tu zab cing byang ba'i phyir 'di ni/ zad pa'i tshig go /'dus ma byas pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi zad pa'i
tshig go /sbyor ba med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni/ nam mkha'i tshig go /sgrib pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ nam mkha'i tshig go /gnas
pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'di ni/ kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go /ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshig go /rnam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i phyir 'di
ni| ye shes kyi tshig go /gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'di ni/ mi rdzi ba'i tshig go /mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir 'di ni/ lus med pa'i tshig go /kun tu rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir
'di ni| yongs su shes pa'i tshig go /sred pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir 'di ni/ kun 'byung ba spangs pa'i tshig go /rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir 'di ni/ 'gog
pa'i tshig go /gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir 'di ni/ sgom pa'i tshig go /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par rab tu phye ba'i phyir 'di ni/ sangs
rgyas pa'i tshig go /rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir 'di ni/ chos kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i phyir 'di
ni| shes rab ces bya'o/ /gang nges par bstan pa thams cad la nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas chos chung du la'ang mi rtog rnam
par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag gsungs so/ /shes rab lta dang mun pa nyon mongs gcod/ /rab tu bag chags nyon mongs rab bsal cing / /rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston/ /mtha' rnams
thams cad yongs su gcod par byed/ /bdag dang sems can la'ang mi gnas shing / /gang zag srog la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis las
thar byed de/ /shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan/ /shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs med/ /shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol/ /shes rab ye shes
byed cing rnam par spyod/ /shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston/ /shes rab kyis ni sgrib pa'i rtsa ba sbyong / /phung po khams ni yongs su shes pa'i mtshan/ /mtshan dang mtshan
gzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa/ /shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes/ /yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste/ /'jig rten thams cad kyis ni mi gos spyod/ /spyad
pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod/ /shes rab dag pa'i mi ni rnam par mdzes/ /mig lnga dag ni yongs su dag byed cing / /dbang po lnga ni yongs su snang bar byed/ /'gro ba lnga
rnams rab tu gcod par byed/ /phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos ston to/ /pha rol tshu rol rtag tu mi gnas shing / /chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shin tu gnas/ /bar snang dang
ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra ba ste/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su mthun zhing 'phags/ /rnyed dang mi rnyed gnyi ga'i mtha' las grol/ /dbus la rtog pa kun rtog mi rtog pa/ /gang rnams
'phags pa thams cad song ba yi/ /'chi ba med pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston/ /sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs/ /lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu
'chad| |bden pa shes par shes rab 'di 'jug ste/ /des ni sngon gyi mtha' yang rab tu bcad/ /zhing rnams thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin/ /chos rnams thams
cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben/ /sems can thams cad bdag med sems can mtshungs/ /shes rab blos dpyod pas ni 'di shes so/ /rigs kyi
bu| de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ni/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/ de
dag gi byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ji snyed mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par
'du byed pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral te dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags shing bsags pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar byed cing de dag thams cad
kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par tshad med par rab tu gnas so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir bdag gis bsod nams tshad
med pa mngon par 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med par brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems
dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa la brtson par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ tshad med pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis
yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas lus kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can
thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pas ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su
'jug pas sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / spyod pa dang ye shes dang spyod lam tshad med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs
su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par
rtog pa dang dpyod pa tshad med pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyan bkod pa thams cad dang / spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan
tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su rdzogs pas mdzod spu yongs su sbyang ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bla ma la
rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa tshad med pas dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug pa ltar mi mthong ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sgyu dang
g.yo med par 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang mthun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par gnon pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ rigs
kyi bu| tshad med pa bcu po de dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'o/ /gzhan yang rigs kyi bu/ nam byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur pa de nam mkha' tshad med pas de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad med par kun tu gnas te/ de bas na/ bsod
nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ gang sems can thams
cad kyi sems la ye shes des khyab par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems su yang
dag pa ji lta bu bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /gti mug dang
bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon
mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /des bdag 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can
gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can rnams
dang / gang zag gzhan dag la zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des bdag nyid gti mug med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang
zag gzhan la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang
zag gzhan dag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do/ /des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos
'chad do/ /'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dman par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu 'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis su med pa'i
mtha'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes te/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de 'dod chags kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de zhe sdang gi
dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de gti mug gi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so/ /de bas na/ chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang
dag par 'du'o/ /zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni/ gar yang 'gro ba med/ mi 'gro ba'ang med do/ /chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyings
shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so/ /de ltar na/ chos kyi dbyings dang / bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos
kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go /de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o/ /gang rab tu snang ba de bla ga ba med pa'o/ /
gang bla gab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do/ /gang mtshan ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas pa ni/ nam mkha'o/ /gang de ltar ye shes
kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub
sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims las kyang mi nyams
pa'o| |ting nge 'dzin las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur pa'o/ /shes rab las kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing chos
thams cad rgyu ba med par yang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing sems gnyis pa la'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa thams cad la'ang mi chags pa'o/ /stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang
mi g.yo ba'o/ /mi 'jigs pa las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las kyang sangs rgyas
rjes su dran zhing chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni/ gang gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi
mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs
rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rje su 'ang 'gro ba'o/ /phung po dang / khams
dang / skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'ang
'gro ba'o/ /gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni/ yid la byed pa thams cad med de/ lta ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'o//
gang de lta bu rnyog pa med pa'i dran pas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su
dran pa ni/ gang spyod lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags pa mi byed do/ /'gro ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba
dang / smra ba dang / mi smra bar yang sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed do/ /de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed/ mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed
do| |de dran pa yid la mi byed pas gzugs dang / mtshan dang / chos nyid du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no/ /rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs
rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/ gang la mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad kun tu spyod pa med pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas gyis gnang ba'i chos rjes
su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod chags med pa'o/ /de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni/ kun gzhi
med pa'o/ /de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni/ nye bar zhi ba ste/ gang sems dang / yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la
chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /chos zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan ma med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do//
chos zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus byas su rab tu gzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do/ /yang chos rjes su dran pa ni/ gang gis
'du byed thams cad skye ba med par mthong ba ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes par rig nas mi
skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo/ /gang de lta bu'i gnas ni/ yang dag pa'i chos kyi gnas so/ /gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa ni/ chos thams cad mngon par rtogs
pa ste| 'di ni/ slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon
par rtogs pa'o/ /de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med do/ /chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa
med pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ dge
'dun zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa ste/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so/ /gang na lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yid kyi las kun tu spyod pa
med pa de ni/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni/ gdags pa dang / tha snyad do/ /'dus ma byas ni/ gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms
pa'o| |tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems
dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong ba zhes bya ba ni/ phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des
chos gang yang btang ba med do/ /'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/ 'di la gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de na/ gtong ba'i mchog go /gang
mi 'dzin pa de ni/ mi gtong ngo / /gang mi gtong ba de ni/ mi snye mas so/ /gang mi snyems pa de ni/ dmigs par mi byed do/ /dmigs par mi byed pa de la sems rgyu ba med do/ /rgyu ba
med pa ni/ sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o/ /gang la sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de ni/
sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o/ /gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa ste/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa ni/
chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do/ /gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni/ rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu 'ang bsngo ste/ de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang
rjes su dran pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni/ chos dang / chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di gnyis su med pa de yid la byed pa ci yang
med do| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos shes pa la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni/ 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa
med pa| smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /ting nge 'dzin
gyis gnas te/ sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no/ /shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/ spros pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /rnam par grol ba'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ gnyis kyis rab tu
phye ba ma yin no/ /mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang ba ma yin no/ /nyon mongs pa zhi ba ste/ so so rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no/ /bde ba thams cad
kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims
rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/ gnyis gang
zhe na| gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na 'khod pa rnams so/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' gnas
gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no/ /yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni/ spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te/ bcu
gang zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na mi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams
cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i nang na don
dang spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na chags pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang /
stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang / spyan thams cad kyi nang na sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi
lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o/ /zhes spyi bo lta bu'i
chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no/ /de'i dran pa de ni/ lta bsam 'khrugs/ bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/ spros pas ma
'khrugs pa ste/ de lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi
bu| de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod pa yin zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba
ni| nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmigs pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi nyid mtshams sbyor
ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing /sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying rje chen po dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis rnam
par rol pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni/ shin tu byin gyis brlabs/ shes rab dang / ye shes ni/ shin tu bsgoms/ sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni/ sgom pa
yongs su dag /sgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni/ gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu skyed pa'am/ 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu spangs shing /
ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas mi skye ba'i las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag
bar zhugs kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang mi 'chad do/ /de ni/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su tshang ba zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes
kyi sgo gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chog shes pa gang yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni/ brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'di
ni| sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go /gang yang sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig /byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyis mi rig pa de la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi shes pas
sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i gang ngo bo nyid dam/ gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan
nyid dam/ byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe
