sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal pa mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ dud 'gro'i
skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/
rang sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ bar ma'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/
nye ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la kha na mtho ba med pa yin
no| |rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ mi zad pa
ste| sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu 'jug pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzung ba'i ye shes la 'jug
pa'ang de snyed do/ /ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi zad cing mtha' med pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi zad cing mtha' med pa'o/ /
chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni/ gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes pa nas gang gi nub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pas
bshad pa dang / 'chad pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin no/ /ma nor ba de bzhin no/ /gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la
yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin nyid
ces bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de bdag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par gzhan du mi btsal te/ de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o/ /yang sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' bo lta bur gyur
kyang de dag thams cad kyis bskal ba bye ba brag stong du'ang yi ge khong du chud par mi nus so/ /yang don gcig tu bstan te ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do/ /de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi brjed cing don thams cad mi
nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/ /bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan thams cad tshar
gcod| nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrog pa de ltar 'dzin to/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no/ /yang rigs kyi bu/ chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo bo
nyid du byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o/ /yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na/ yongs su ma grub pa'i tshul
gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis
mig yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul
gyis mtshan ma med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyis 'dod chags
med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid de/ de ltar rigs kyi bu/ tha snyad du gzhan rnam par rig pa la brten nas de 'dra ba
chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni/ tshig gis brjod par mi nus so/ /de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ste/ yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la
bstan par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu/ sems
can gyi khams ni/ thog ma nas rnam par dag pa ste/ de la sems can rnams kyi rtse ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas sems
can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ /srog tu lta bar ma yin/ gang zag tu lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /yang de 'di
snyam du sems te/ sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni/ phyin ci log ste/ rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa dang / yang
dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod snyam mo/ /de la byang chub sems dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir sems can
rnams la chos ston te/ dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to/ /sems can med cing sems can dben pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar byang chub
sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor
bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud ce na/ tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra
bar 'bras bu mngon par 'grub bo/ /sbyin pa ni/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas sbyin pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /tshul khrims ni/ lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/ lha dang mir skyes nas byang chub sems dpas sems can rnams tshul khrims
la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba des de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bzod pa dang /
des pa ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pas byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin
te| phan par 'dod pa bzod pa'i gnas de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /brtson 'grus ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpas brtson 'grus ba rtsams nas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par grub pa'i
brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsdos nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /bsam gtan ni/ sems dga' ba dang / cang shes pa'i rgyu
ste| byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba dang / cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun skong ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /thos pa ni/ shes rab che ba'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni/ dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing dmigs pa med pa'i
thos pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de dge
ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang / gang bsags pa de dang / de'i 'bras bu lhun gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te/ rgyu dang / rkyen de ni/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya'o//
gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni/ bdag yin te/ ji ltar bdag ni/ bdag med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la bdag med do//
ji ltar na/ bdag stong pa de bzhin du chos thams cad stong ngo / /ji ltar bdag ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam
du zad do/ /de ltar tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro/ /gang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi
chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid do/ /de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ji ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'jig tshogs
la lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro/ /yang byang chub sems dpa' ni/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug
cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes pa bskyed de/ ye shes dang ldan/ shes rab dang ldan/ blo dang ldan/ bzod pa dang
ldan| tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing lus dben/ sems dben te/ 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyis nang nye bar 'gro zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba/
yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtag pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs
pa| snang ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs
bsags pa/ sbyin pas brtan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i go gyon pa/ brtson 'grus kyi ya la da bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes rab shin tu bsgoms
pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ byams pas rjes su mthun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par sgrub pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa bskyed do/ byang
chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/
gzugs thams cad mthong / sgra thams cad thos/ sems thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa/ zag pa
zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing / yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad la de bzhin
du lhun gyis grub par gnas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/
de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ zab
mo zhes bya ba ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i tshul ni/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/
rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug /skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen/

gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams su 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs
par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ 'di ni/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /de la
rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag /'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes
pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag /ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag /skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag /reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba
'gag /tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag /sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag /len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag /srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags
pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smra sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig
'gag par 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ rigs kyi bu/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o/ /sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i
rgyu gang dang / rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni/ chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ gang nyan thos dang / rang sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa
dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo/ /rang gi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshams
sbyor ba shes so/ /gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshogs
ni| kun tu btsal kyang mi dmigs so/ /gang mi dmigs pa de ni/ zab mo'o/ /bdag ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma brnyes so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma
nas kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rnam par dag go /de ci'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la chos gang yang ma
skyes| ma skyed/ ma 'gags/ mi 'gag pa ste/ de bas na/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o/ /mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun gzhi med pa/ rab rib med pa/ don dam pa zab mo gang la
mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med pa ste/ de ni/ yul du bgrang ba ma yin no/ /gang yul ma yin zhing yul med pa de ni/ don dam pa
ste| de'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o/ /de la sems dang / yid 'dzin pa med de rtogs par dka' ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la
ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing sems can gzhan la'ang rab tu ston te/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos dang /
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa/ bam po gsum pa/ rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/
byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang
chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/ gang rten pa de ni/ ci'ang ma yin pa/ gang rten pa de ni/ dngos po med pa/ gang rten pa de ni/ yongs su ma grub pa/ gang rten cing
'brel par 'byung ba de ni/ mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med pa/ zhi ba/ gang rten pa de la ni/ bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gso ba
med| skyes bu med/ gang zag med/ shed las skyes med/ shed bu med/ gang rten pa de la ni/ yang dag par 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang rten pa de la ni/ ci'ang med pa/
rtsol ba med pa/ stong pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ dben pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba ni/ chos kho na skye/ 'gag pa ni/ chos kho na 'gag ste/
'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba'am/ skyes bu'am/ gang zag gam/ shes las skyes sam/ shed bu med ces bya'o/ /chos gang dag rten cing 'brel
par 'byung ba de dag la ni/ skye ba ci'ang med cing bdag po med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu zhes bya ste/ ji
ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba ni/ skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du nang gi chos rnams skye ba na'ang skyed par byed pa med/
'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med de/ gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na/ 'byung gi /rkyen ma tshang na/ 'gog go snyam du sems te/ de ltar na shes pa la sbyor ba ni/ mthar
lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo / /de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes bya ba ni/ chad pa dang / rtag pa ste/ de gang mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jig pa ni/ chad pa dang / rtag pa dang bral
ste| de'i phyir dag pas na/ mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te
mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bzhin nyid dbyar med pa shes pa
la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin dbyer med pa de ni/ phyag rgya ste/ phye ba med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa/ mi bskyod
pa| bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
rten ni/ phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de ni/ shin tu mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin
tu smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha' phyag
rgya| shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dper na/ nam mkha'i phyag rgya ma snang ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de'ang spyan lnga la mi snang ste/ rang gi
mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad du ji snyed du tha snyad 'dogs pa de thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa de bzhin
du tha snyad 'dogs so/ /de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni/ chos rnam par 'jog par byed do/ /gang dag rnam par shes pa la mi gnas pa de dag ni/ chos rnam
par 'jog par mi byed/ chos tha dad du mi byed do/ /de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do/ /de la de bzhin nyid tha
dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o/ /gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de dag de bzhin
nyid tha dad mi byed do/ /yang ji snyed mang po brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/ dper na/ sems can thams cad ni/ nam mkha' la rnam
par rgyu'ang nam mkha'i khams ni/ 'dres par mi byed do/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu'ang de bzhin nyid ni/ 'dres par mi byed do/ /
gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do/ /rigs kyi
bu| de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni/
rdul thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so/ /yang dag par bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbyings so/ /ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog pa'i dbyings
so| |'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i dbyings so/ /rgal ba med pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa'i dbyings so/ /'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i dbyings so/ /dus gsum mnyam pa'i
phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so/ /gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag gi dbyings so/ /don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so/ /gnas med pa'i phyir
rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyings so/ /'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyings so/ /ngas par 'gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i dbyings so/ /rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so/ /gnyen po med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ 'di ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos thams
cad de ltar zhugs pas de la byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa de thams cad ni/
chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med par rab tu shes so/ /
de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /zhe sdang gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni/
chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gti mug gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin
can no/ /nyon mongs pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /'dod pa'i
khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / chos
kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyi khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / chos kyi
dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /mig gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis
su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni/
chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni/ chos
kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /yid kyi bar gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no/ /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /phung po'i
khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phung po'i khams ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i
khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /
chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / chos thams cad kyi bar dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni/ gnyis su med de/ de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang
dag par gzhol ba'i chos thams cad rab tu shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang
chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje ltar sra
zhing mi phyed pa bcu gnyis kyis ni/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi phyed pa dang / bsam pa dang /
lhag pa'i bsam pas spyor ba mi phyed pa dang / sbyin pa mi phyed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab mi phyed pa dang / byams
pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi phyed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa
mi phyed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba mi phyed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngoms pa mi phyed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa
mi phyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba mi phyed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mi phyed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag las mi phyed pa de'i tshe bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra
zhing mi phyed pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni/ nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni/ mi phigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed pa'ang sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal dang / nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / lta bar gyur pa rnams sel kyang bdag nyid ni/ theg pa chen
po 'di las mi phyed do/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin no/ /
rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma yin
pa| yul med pa yul thams cad las yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas gang gi yul yongs su sbyong
ste| de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'ang / ring ba ma yin no/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben
pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul ni/ mig gi yul gang yang med do/ /rna ba'i yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma
yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ rna ba'i yul gang yang med do/ /sna'i yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin
yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ sna'i
yul gang yang med do/ /lce'i yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/
dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ lce'i yul gang yang med do/ /lus kyi yul ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye
pa'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni/ lus kyi yul gang yang med do/ /yid kyi yul ni/
sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni/ dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben
pa'i yul la ni/ yid kyi yul gang yang med do/ /phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis la'ang de bzhin
no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyi yul thams cad dben par 'jug go /rang gi zhing yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
la zhugs pa de ni/ /chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar gyur pa de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pas 'jug go /ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa
med cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin du de yul thams cad la'ang mi chags mi thogs te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang
gi yul yongs su dag pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' gzungs yongs su sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ sum cu rtsa gnyis bo 'di
dag ni/ gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'dod pa dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' zhing mos pa
dang / chos la gzhol ba dang / chos la bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la brten cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing
btsun par gus par byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' blo bde zhing mthun par 'dzin pa dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams
la ston pa tsam du sems shing 'khrul ba mi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo med pa dang | chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med cing zang zing med par chos
sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas thos pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir mang du thos pa mu med par byas pa dang /
tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa med par byas pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / yang dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug
mi 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
dang mi 'gal ba'i las dang / bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtog pa la mi skrag pa dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun
'dzin pas yongs su mi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang / sems can la lta bas snying rje che ba dang / chos la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor
ba dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
la gzungs gang zhe na/ gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs par khong du chud pa dang / blo
gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad pa dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la
'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer med pa'i de kho na bstan pa shes pa
dang | bden pa la 'jug pa nges pa shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'gong pa shes
pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rig pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa dang / mthun
pa shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas pa dang / zhi gnas kyi sems gnas par shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par grol ba rjes su
mthun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jug pa shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos
po bzhi so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer med par shes pa dang / tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa
dang | sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i dran pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi

ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba ba la 'jug pa
shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o/ /lus dang ngag dang sems dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs
pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par skyed pa 'di ni gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs
rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod par shes par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin no/ /rigs kyi
bu| de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi sbyin gyis brlabs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ nyi
shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin te/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs
pa med pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / legs par brgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa med
pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / mdo dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs
pa dang / mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / tshig
btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa'i 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs pa dang / the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs pa dang /
'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang / 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi
spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de
dag ni| byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no/ /de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba byas pa nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bla ma'i ngag mi
gcog pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshur shog ces bya ba dang song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad la chags
pa med pas spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs ba rgyun mi chad par 'gyur ro/ /phra ma'i tshig med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs
par 'gyur ro/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas sna tshogs la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chung ma legs par
brgyan te rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas zhum pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi phung po legs
par kun tu bsrungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / dril bu sna tshogs byin pas tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs
bstan pa nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung
ba la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon med pa la mi brnyas pas mi thul ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /gter mi zad pa sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos
la sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad pa la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /tshig bden pa dang / tha ba med pa dang / ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa
shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /bla ma'i tshig khyad du mi gsong pa dang / gzhan gyi tshig mi gcod pas tshig btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /rang gi yon
tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos bstan pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /bdag la mi bstod pa dang / gzhan la mi smod pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po
yongs su gtong ba lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan gyi spobs par 'gyur ro/ /chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas the tshom thams cad gcod
pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /bstan bcos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la mi gnod pa dang / nad pa rnams kyi nad g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin pas 'jig
rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba dang / 'khrul
pa la mi rtog pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang / mya ngan
las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bas 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba
dang / btang snyoms kyi spobs bar 'gyur ro/ /bka' blo bde ba dang / des pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par
mi byed pas skye ba dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rje che ba dang /
thams cad nan tan la 'god pas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro/ /sems can gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes
bya'o| |sems can gzhan la nan tan du bya ba ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /sems can gzhan
gyi sems pa dang mthun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ chos dang / yon tan dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ spobs pa
thogs pa med cing rgyun mi chad la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang /
'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la
dbang thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i gogs po yongs su spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i ba shes gnyen bsten pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa
dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa shes pa dang / shes
rab dang thabs zung du 'brel ba dang / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung par so sor rtog pa dang / bsam bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam
yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la nges par sems pa dang / chos la sgyu ma lta bur rtog pa dang / 'chi 'pho med par
'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyis chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa nas skye ste 'pho zhing 'byung ba skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang / 'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ byang chub sems dpa'
gang dang gang du skyes nas sems can gyi don byed pa'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs de dag thams cad ni/ rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/
'di lta ste/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa drang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang /
'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang / phyir rgol ba thams cad
yang dag par bcom pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /ji
ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtog pas nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /rtan cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtogs pas 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag
par 'da'o/ /byang chub kyi sems mi nyams pas lha'i bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da'o/ /yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa
gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub kyi sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las
dang / sems can tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas pa'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig
rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing ro myang ba'i bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi chos ngan pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas yongs su
skyo ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su mi bsngo ba bdud kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa la mi smod pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi
las dang / byang chub sems dpa' la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud kyi las dang / byams pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
yongs su mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang / zang zing dang
'brel par chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang /
tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan thos kyi bslab pa'i rjes su mthun pa bdud kyi
las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas rigs la rtog pa bdud
kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems sems can gyi ci bya'o cog la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang / nga rgyal
la gnas shing mi 'dud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / mi drang ba dang / rtsub cing brlang ba dang / sdig pa la mi smod pa dang / chos kyi
drungs 'byin pa dang / thob pa cung zad kyis chog par 'dzin pa dang / chos ma yin pa don du gnyer ba dang / chos ma yin pa 'dod pa dang / sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam
par mi gnon pa bdud kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma mi rtog pa bdud kyi las dang / dge sbyong gi dri ma la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu/ ji cam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa
dang / dge ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni/ bdud kyi las so/ /chos bzhis ni/ bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin tu 'da' ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma
brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag dang / dad pa dang brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la gnas te sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang / chos
kyi tshul zab mo la gnas te dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so/ /rigs kyi bu/ de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das
shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams
cad 'tsho bar gyur pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ /'byung po rnams
la snying rje bar gnas pa yin/ bsam gtan rnams la de la ma chags par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams
dag gis longs spyod mthun pa yin/ bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin/ mtho dman gyi yid med pas sems dang mtshungs pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam
pa 'byor ba yin/ mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no/ /ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi
'tsho bar gyur pa de bzhin du bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur cig /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos shes pa la
mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig /ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su bsngo ste/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs
rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba shes pas stobs bcu yongs
su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin no/ /zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus gsum la chags pa med pa'i ye shes
kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi snang ba thob pas spyan lnga yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar
phyin pa yin/ byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ /nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas
dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i
rgyan yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang bskur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi
mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad
kyi sems dang / spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad dang 'dra
ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod do/ /de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba'am/ gzugs su snang ba'am/ sgrar snang
ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i
ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ ro gcig pa yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro
gcig pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ dus las mi yol ba yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin pa la so sar rtog
pas byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi yol lo/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bag chags
kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ chu thams cad zad pas bri
ba'am| gang ba med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zad pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba'am/ gang bar mi byed do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/
kha tshon tshad med do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po ni/ sems can tshad
med pa'i gnas yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i gnas yin no/ /'di ni/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin
la 'jug pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa la mi chags pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu/ de
la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhe na/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang chos rnams la lta ba
kun nas ldang ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/ /'di lta ste/ dper
na| rlung mar ni/ nam mkha'i dkyil na mi chags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa'ang sems can thams cad la mi chags so/ /
yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni/ spyod pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni/ dran pa'o/ /spyod pa ni/ rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o/ /de dag ni/ mun pa dang bral zhing
snang ba thob pa'ang yin te/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang chos rnams la mi shes pa'o/ /snang ba zhes bya ba ni/ gang chos rnams la ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de
dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa zhes bya'o/ /skyes bu dam pa de dag ni/ ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi ye shes thob pa yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag
rang byung gi ye shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs pa'i ye shes
bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshe myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig
su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/ /gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dben zhing / /mkhas pa bsod nams tshogs ni rab byed la/ /mtshan ma ldan pa yongs su spangs nas su/ /byang chub phyir
bsngos de ni zad mi 'gyur/ /nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas/ /de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed/ /mtha' yas blo ldan nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid/ /kun mkhyen ye shes
yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa/ /gzugs dang mtshan gyi chos su ma yin te/ /gang na sems dang yid ni mi rgyub/ /de ni mthun par sangs rgyas rjes
su dran| |chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben/ /zhi zhing rab zhi rtag tu mtshan ma med/ /gang zhig dmigs pa thams cad bral gyur pa/ /de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa
yin| |'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin tu 'dus ma byas/ /stong pa mtshan med smon las rnam par grol/ /de la sems med dran dang 'jug pa med/ /de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin/ /phung
po yongs su btang ba thams cad gtong / /nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs par 'dor/ /snyems pa med cing rtog dang rnam rtog dag /'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dran/ /
tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med/ /'byung ba med cing srid gsum mi gnas pa/ /de ni tshul khrims
rjes su dran pa yin/ /lha gang dag cing dri med nyon mongs med/ /dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob gyur ba/ /sems can dag pa de dag 'di dran zhing / /bdag kyang myur du de
'drar 'gyur snyam sems/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni/ /nyon mongs dngos po thams cad 'dzin mi byed/ /chos dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol/ /de
'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin/ /rgyal bas byang chub mtshan nyid gang bsnyes pa/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni yongs 'dzin cing / /gang gis rdul med mtha' 'dir rab shes
pa| |de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin/ /bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag /chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtogs pa/ /de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal
te| |sems can btang phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed/ /sems can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing / /de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong ba med/ /lta ba nor pa rab tu spang bar ston/ /
de 'dra de ni sems can mang po spyod/ /'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa/ /des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu ston/ /sangs rgyas yul ni nam mkha' mtshungs pa ste/ /
de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes/ /sgra skad dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni/ /brag ca 'dra bar de yis rab mthong zhing / /de la nyan pa'ang shin tu yod min par/ /de ltar rab
tu shes pa gzungs thob bo/ /kun tu 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog pa dang / chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam pa rab bshad kyi/ /bdag dang sems can chos su rlom sems med/ /de ni gzungs
la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing / /legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa/ /dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur/ /gzungs la
nges pa'i yon tan 'di dag go /chos ni rnam pa kun tu bsags med pas/ /chos la mi 'phro 'phros pa med pa'ang min| /dper na klu ni char rgyun 'bebs pa ltar/ /de ltar de yang
chos kyi char pa 'bebs/ /yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni/ /thogs med rgyun chags rgyun chad mi 'gyur par/ /mdo sde stong phrag bye ba rab tu 'chad/ /sems can dbang
po sems can 'du shes med/ /sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du/ /rgyun mi chad par chos ni rab ston cing / /bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed/ /spobs pa'i
tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tan gnas/ /chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba bzhes/ /gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la/ /sems can srog dang gang zag mi
'dzin pa/ /de ni rgyal pa rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin/ /sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das/ /de dag de ltar kun tu skye ba med/ /su yi bzod pa 'di
'dra'i 'od gsal ba/ /de ni bstan pa 'di la bag yod yin/ /phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong / /chos dbyings ji 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes/ /dbang po drug ni grong
stong 'dra mthong ba/ /de ni phung po'i bdud las yang dag 'da'/ /sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams/ /bag yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing / chos la mi rtog
rnam par mi rtog pa/ de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag 'da'/ /gang zag skye ba rtag tu skye med shes/ /'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med/ /chos rnams 'od med song ba med
shes pa| |de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi dbang mi 'gro /gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing / /byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med/ /bdag dang sems can med kyang
snying rje 'jug /de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud 'dul lo/ /rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong / /'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la min/ /'gro ba'i sems ni
sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba/ /de ni sems dpa'i rdzi ba med pa yin/ /pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags la/ /chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing / /sems can sgrol yang sems
can 'du shes med/ /mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de/ /srid pa gsum po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang / /stong pa 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing / /lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems
can sgrol/ /de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa/ /mdzangs pa de ni tshul dang tshul min mkhas/ /chos rnams gdod nas stong par rab tu shes/ /tshul dang rigs pa mya ngan 'das la mdzud/
byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya/ /sems kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur/ /sems ni sems la nam yang mtshams mi sbyor/ /'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes
pa| |byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren ces bya/ /nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang chu zla ltar/ /chos rnams thams cad dag cing rnam dag ces/ /nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed
pa| |sems can dag pa de ni ma smad pa/ /gang zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun/ /sgyu ma mig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang / /gsog dang rdzun dang rtag pa med par shes/ /de ni
byang chub snying por myur du 'gro /chos gtan la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig
phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur
to| |stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/ /snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur
to| |lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang dkrol nas 'di skad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / nan tan
byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi yul du rjes su dong ba yin no/ /gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas
pa rnams kyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur na chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu dam pa
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan
pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod mngon du rangs par mdzad pas mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa stong gsum yongs su
gang ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon bar gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni/ chags pa
mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba bstan pa 'di ni/ rgyun mi chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to/ /theg pa chen po 'di 'ang
rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la'ang chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur to/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la'ang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyis
zhus pa| |bam po bzhi pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur ba spobs pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang
chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ gang khyod kyi ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de/ ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/ smras pa/ rigs
kyi bu| de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni/ kho bo'i mdzod do/ /myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ nam mkha'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyad par ston cig /de nas byang
chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bos nam mkha'
las char dbab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa 'di snyam du sems te| de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ut+pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma
bkod pa zhes bya ba na 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma rgya ni/ rgyang grags kyi tshad/ 'dab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po 'jam zhing gzhon pa/ gos ka tsa lin+di ka
ltar reg na bde ba/ dris ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing chog mi shes pa/ pad+ma de mthong ba dang dri ma
snams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de bdag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char phob cig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems
dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsam ma thag tu de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i ngos las de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon par
phab ste/ de nas 'khor de dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri mthong zhing tshor bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'khor de thams cad ting nge 'dzin las
langs te byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces 'jer to/ /skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs legs so legs so/ /sems
can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen po bkod pa zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa'
nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phye'i char phob cig /byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas tshig de skad ces
smras ma thag tu de'i mod la nam mkha' las gser phye'i char mngon par phab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod pas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la
'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char phob cig /tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu nas ri rab kyi tshad
tsam gyi rin po che grangs med/ dpag tu med pa/ ming tha dad pa/ kha dog tha dad yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par phab pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang /
bai DUR+ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i ze ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen byu ru dang / zla ba'i 'od
dang / me shel dang / snang byed dang / 'od mchog dang / 'dzam gling me 'od dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / an+da rnyil dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang /
rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu dang bar byed dang / sa'i 'od dang / mi phyed pa'i gnas dang / mig mi bzod pa dang / brgya byin thogs pa dang / rgyal
ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze ba can dang / 'jig rten snang ba dang / skar ma dga' dang / 'od 'dzin dang / zla gam
dang / dzam+bu'i chu 'od dang / dzam+bu'i gling gi 'od dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mda'i sgo dang / me'i 'od dang / rgyal bas brgyan pa dang / tsha ba zhi byed dang / gdung ba med
dang / nad sel dang / mig spyod dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid sbyong dang / yan lag rnam par snang ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po
dang / 'od ser po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i
rin po che'i char rab tu phab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming bskal par yang zad par sla ba ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems
dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can sdug bsngal zhing dbul ba/ zas dang skom med pa/ gcer bu
gos med pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dwags rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi skras yog pa/ mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / khrag dang /
rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi char khyod kyis phob cig /de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa'i khu ba dang / btung ba thams cad kyi char gyi
rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par bab bo/ /gos kha dog du ma dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du ma dang / phra zhing 'jam pa ka ca lin+di ka ltar reg na bde
ba'i char rab tu phab ste/ de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / yi dwags thams cad kun tshim par byas so/ /de nas
byang chub sems dpa'i sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can
na ba| g.yog med pa/ nad du mas reg pa yod pa de dag gi don du sman chen po'i char gang gis na ba de dag thams cad nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba phob cig /de nas de ma
thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'i sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes
bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig /de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las
'od rab tu btang ste sems can dmyal ba ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab
tu ldan par gyur te ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang /
byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa dang / rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang / glu'i dbyangs dang / bran po dang
bran mo dang / chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / slas dang / rta dang / bal glang dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu chung dang / bzhon ba dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang /
grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / skyed mos tshal dang / yang tog dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzang dang / rta babs dang /
skar khung dang / zla ba kham pa lta bu dang / khri dang / khyogs dang / glang bzhi pa dang / glang bcu drug pa nas rta cang shes stong gis grangs pa dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang
las mngon par rab tu bab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
dag /'di dag longs la byin cig /yongs su btang bar bgyis te sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan ces bya ba
des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i char ni/ phab na/ de yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i char phob cig /des tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed
brjod pa de snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi yon tan bsngags pa'i sgra bar snang las byung ngo / /de bzhin du bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes
rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra'ang ci tsam phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i
chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par bar snang las ma lus par rdzogs par byung ngo / /chos kyi sgra nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad go bar byas so/ /de nas tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba
zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so/ /byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' zhig na'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod snyam
mo| |de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi kun tu rtog pa sems kyis shes so/ /shes nas kyang byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu snang ba la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod shin tu dri ma med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams rnams su ci mthong ltos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang bas lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/ des phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu bab pa dang / chos kyi sgra thams cad grags pa dang / de bzhin
du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung ba mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur
nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin rlabs grub pa de ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ga lar yang gcig car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di
'dra ba'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo/ /zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad
dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo / /yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis rin po
che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so/ /de nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yugs mo lnga
brgya byung nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces
smras so| |skyes bu dam pa/ khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la'ang khyo stsol cig /de nas de ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bud med de dag gi sngon gyi khyo'i kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes bu lnga brgya nam mkha' las babs nas byang chub sems
dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sring mo dag /bdag bdag gi khyo ji
lta ba bzhin du khrid cig /de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta bur rang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nas dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste yid bde ba skyes nas rang rang gi khyim
du dong ngo / /de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun du bud med de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems las phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar
smin par byas so/ /de nas yang bud med lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa dag smras so/ /chos kyi rang bzhin
stong pa sgyu ma 'dra/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal/ /de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khyo stsal te/ /bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la des smin bgyis/ /chos 'di thams cad yang dag
sprul pa ste/ /g.yo ba med cing byed med snga nas stong / /zag med ye shes bdag gis rab rtogs te/ /slan chad nyon mongs dbang du mi mchi'o/ /byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par
bgyi| |sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi/ /sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin/ /bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dbab/ /'dren mchog thub pas de
dag lung bstan pa/ /khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni/ /spyad pa spyod nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag /shin tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur/ /yang de'i tshe na mi lnga brgya gsang
par chad de gsod du khrid pa las de dag gis bar snang las sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jigs
pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyi/ de la khyed cag phyag tshol cig dang / gsod pa 'di las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes sgra zhig thos so/ /de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs skrag pas sgra
skad gcig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes tshig de skad ces smras so/ /tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu skad cig de nyid
la bar snang las mi lnga brgya babs te/ der lhags nas gshed ma'i mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag bsad de ci rub/
nged cag gi gos dang rgyan rnams khyer la nged cag gi srog bcad de mi 'di dag khye zhig /de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir gsod pa'i phyir mi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste sprul pa'i skyes bu de
dag bsad do/ /de nas mi gsad pa las btang ba de dag gsod pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong
ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la'ang mgo bos phyag btsal/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la'ang thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol
to| |skyes bu dam pa/ khyod kyis bdag cag gi srog dang dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na/ bdag cag chos gang la nan tan du bgyis pas bdag la sman pa dang / gzhan la
sman pa la zhugs par 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa bdag cag la stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyed cag bla na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro/ /de dag la de skad ces smras
pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung gcig byin te/ grogs
po dag /ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig /de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams
cad bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang pa las 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos tshul yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
rten du 'byung ngo / /zhes lung bstan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis gang mi
skam mi zad mi dengs pa'i nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ji snyam du sems/ ji nam mkha' skam pa'am/
zad pa yod dam/ dengs par 'gyur ram/ smras pa rigs kyi bu/ de lta ma yin no/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du byang chub de ni/ nam mkha' ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de
la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der bsngos pas de bas na/ nam mkha' la mdzod mi skam mi zad mi dengs so/ /yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba
ni| kho bos byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon pa de srid do/ /smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lon/ smras pa/
bcom ldan 'das kyi mkhyen pas mkhyen to/ /de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
mdzod kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas ji srid lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na/ lha dang bcas
pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'khor 'di na sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dang par 'gyur pa dang mchis kyi/ bshad du
gsol| |bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed kyi sangs rgyas
kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis yongs su gang bar gyur te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phra mo gcig bzhag la de lta bur
bgrang ba dang / mtshan ma bzhag pa de snyed kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ni/ zad par 'gyur gyi/ ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang
gi thad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan ci zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsal pa| yang shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rin po che bkod pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha
dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las shin tu byung ba rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA
ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi tshad du gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni/ bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo / /
shA ri'i bu/ de'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams de na stong gsum gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/
rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub pa dgu khri drug stong yod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na
bud med kyi ming yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub bo/ /de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur bas bar gyi bskal
pa bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gror byas te nyin gcig la 'god pa'ang ri rab bye ba stong snyed kyi rin po che phung po zad par 'gyur ba de lta bus
bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro byas so/ /de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyis brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi mi rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang bcas te bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/ /shA ri'i bu/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam
du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi lta'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na stong gsum gyi 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad
kyis dbang bkur ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das/ de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen
po rnyed par nus so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
la rim gro dang / bsti stang byas te byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag pas bsam pa yongs su sbyangs te/ gang+gA'i klung gi
bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs/ /gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs su dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye
ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson
'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su
sbyangs| gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang / thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag pas byams pa chen po yongs su
sbyangs pa nas snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so/ /de bzhin du lus
yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs
su sbyangs so/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thams cad nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar du des gang+gA'i klung
gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dag pas nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so/ /shA
ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du
rigs kyi bu/ 'di'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad yongs su dag pas gang la'ang zad pa med do/ /des na/ 'di nam mkha' mdzod ces bya'o/ /bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub
sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag na rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes
bya ba des byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi bu/ bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrags pa'i mdzod mnyan to/ /nam mkha' mdzod
kyis smras pa/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu/ gus pa dang bcas shing zhes dang bcas par 'dug la nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so/ /de
nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha' la phyag btsal te 'khod do/ /de nas byang chub
sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis par snang las tshigs su bad pa 'di dag byung ngo / /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyi/ /thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin/ /
de la 'jug pa rab bstan gyi/ /khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis/ /nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med/ /dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te/ /gang gi chos nyid mtho dma' med/ /de la 'dud pa
ga la yod/ /nam mkha' la ni skye ba med/ /'gog pa dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la/ /de la rnam par rtog pa med/ /nam mkha' la ni bri ba med/ /gang ba
dag kyang mi dmigs so/ /chos rnams gang med bri med de/ /nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo/ /nam mkha' la ni mun pa med/ /de ni de yis nyon mi mongs/ /sems kyi rang bzhin
'od gsal bas/ /de bas nam yang nyon mongs med/ /nyi zla yi ni 'od zer gyis/ /nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang / /gang la'ang
dga' bar 'gyur ba med/ /mdung thung rtse gnyis 'bab pas kyang / /nam mkha' la ni nyon mongs med/ /de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis/ /rgyal ba'i sras ni nyon mi mongs/ /
bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis/ /nam mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med/ /rnyed dang bsti stang thams cad kyis/ /byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed/ /bstod pa dang ni smad pa la/ /nam mkha'
yongs su mi rtog ste/ /de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la/ /byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo/ /sa dag g.yos par gyur kyang ni/ /nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba min/ /'jig rten 'di
